meanings.definition: Create or design (something that has not existed before)
meanings.sent1: She invented a new recipe for cookies.
meanings.sent2: Thomas Edison invented the light bulb.
meanings.sent3: The kids invented a game using only sticks and stones.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination invented a world of magical creatures.
meanings.sent5: The scientist invented a machine that could teleport objects.

meanings.definition: Come up with or devise (an idea or concept)
meanings.sent1: He invented a clever excuse for being late.
meanings.sent2: Marie Curie invented a groundbreaking theory in science.
meanings.sent3: The comedian invented a hilarious character for his show.
meanings.sent4: Her mind invented a solution to the complex puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The writer invented a captivating story that kept readers hooked.
